title: Jump to last edit
content: You can jump to the last edit with the command ---g;---

title: Select everything in buffer
content: To select everything in the buffer you can use the command ---ggVG---

title: Move to first non-blank character of line
content: ---^--- Moves you to the first non-blank character of the line you are on

title: Toggle case of selected character
content: ---~--- Toggles the case of current character. This can be used to upper/lowercase an entire word with ---viw~---
